query: What is the plot of Inception?
response: A thief enters dreams to steal secrets.
title: Inception
description: A skilled thief enters people's dreams to steal corporate secrets.

query: Who is the main character in The Godfather?
title: The Godfather
description: The patriarch of a crime dynasty hands control to his reluctant son.

query: What challenge does Batman face in The Dark Knight?
title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind terrorizing Gotham.

response: A poor family cons its way into a rich household.
title: Parasite
description: A poor family infiltrates a wealthy household with dire consequences.

response: Explorers travel through a wormhole to save humanity.
title: Interstellar
description: A group of explorers journey through a wormhole to find a new home.
